questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I see myself in ten years, working as a successful architect, living in a modern house in the city. I will be married and have a child. I will continue to improve my English skills and travel to different countries for work and pleasure. I will have a happy and fulfilling life.
